abstract.text: A client for making connections to the Stripe API.
Confirms the SetupIntent object with the provided params object.
At a minimum, the params object must include the
Starts polling the Source object with the given ID. For payment methods that require
additional customer action (e.g. authorizing a payment with their bank), polling
allows you to determine if the action was successful. Polling will stop and the
provided callback will be called once the source’s status is no longer
or if the given timeout is reached and the source is still
. If polling
stops due to an error, the callback will be fired with the latest retrieved
source and the error.
Note that if a poll is already running for a source, subsequent calls to
with the same source ID will do nothing.

PaymentSheet is a prebuilt UI that combines all the steps required to pay - collecting payment details, billing details, and confirming the payment - into a single sheet that displays on top of your app.

account for which this request is being made.
